title: Machan Peru Madhurey Song Lyrics Madhurey
stanzas:
Machan peru madhura
nee ninnu paaru edhira

Machan peru madhura
nee ninnu paaru edhira
naan rekka katti
parandhu varum
rendu kaalu kudhira(2)

parai addichaa paatu varum
urai adicha aattam varum
katti vellam unna paartha
katterumbu kooda varume

Machan peru madhura
nee ninnu paaru edhira

urumi urumi melam
iva orasa orasa thaazham
koondhal paadham
iva koadi rubaa yezham

udukka udukka iduppe
idhu endha naatu nadappe
thaththalikkum paerazhagu
thakkaali pazha sevappe

ettu katti paaduven
voodu katti aaduven
patti thotti serndhu vandha
palaa kaththi vesuven

naalu nalla naaludaa
nadappathellaam thoolu da
nooru kodi aalu kitta
enna pathi kaeluda

azhagaana mugame
hello hello sugame
suttu viral thottu putta
theepidikkudhu nagame

Machan peru madhura
nee ninnu paaru edhira
naan rekka katti
parandhu varum
rendu kaalu kudhira

Neruppu neruppu kozhi
iva nerungi vandha thozhi
vervayila thee anaikkum
vithaiya kathukodi

aruvi aruvi paaichal
naan unakkul aadum neechal
ala pola naan vilaiyaadinaa
adangaadho undhan kaaichal

pala palakkum chittu da
banarasu pattu da
thangathaale senji vacha
thanjaavooru thattudaa

othaiyaaga oada
oadi vilaiyaadavaa
pathu viral kaathirukku
pandhal onnu poadavaa

azhagaana thirudi
enakkula irudi
konji konji pesikalaam
konja neram porudi..

Machan peru madhura
nee ninnu paaru edhira

parai addichaa paatu varum
urai adicha aattam varum
katti vellam unna paartha
katterumbu kooda varume
